function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate understanding of paint nature and endurance","Impact":"Potential for ineffective disease transmission reduction","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough research and testing before commercialization","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, manufacturers","Owner":"Research institutions, paint manufacturers"},{"Description":"Misuse of antimicrobial particles in paints","Impact":"Potential harmful effects on human health and the environment","Mitigation":"Regulation and oversight of the use of antimicrobial particles","Technologies":"Regulatory frameworks, monitoring systems","People":"Manufacturers, regulatory agencies","Owner":"Government, regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Improper installation or maintenance of air ionization systems","Impact":"Failure to improve indoor air quality and reduce disease transmission","Mitigation":"Proper training and maintenance protocols for installation and upkeep","Technologies":"Training programs, maintenance procedures","People":"Installers, maintenance personnel","Owner":"Building management, maintenance teams"}]}
